member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo
member.summary: Provides information about a download process.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.Exception
member.summary: If an exception occurs during download process, the exception object will be stored here. If no exception occurs, this property is null/Nothing.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.SizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of downloaded data in bytes.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.Timeout
member.summary: The setted timeout for download process in milliseconds.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.StartTime
member.summary: The start time of download process, independent to individual preparation of passed parameters for start downloading.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.EndTime
member.summary: The end time of the download process, independent to post-processing actions like parsing.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionInfo.TimeSpan
member.summary: The time span of start and end time.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadCompletedEventArgs`1
member.summary: Base event class for completed asynchronous download processes that provides additionally the response of the download. This class must be inherited.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadEventArgs
member.summary: Base event class for asynchronous download processes and provides the individual user argument. This class must be inherited.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadEventArgs.UserArgs
member.summary: Gets the user argument that were passed when the download was started.
member.returns: An object defined by the user

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadCompletedEventArgs`1.Response
member.summary: Gets the response of the download process.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.Response`1
member.summary: Base response class for download processes. This class must be inherited.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.Response`1.Connection
member.summary: Gets connection information of the download process.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.UserArgs
member.summary: Gets the user arguments of each download process.
member.remarks: If you just need a single object, you should use UserArgs(Int32) property, because of higher performance.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.UserArgs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the user argument of a download process at a specific index position.
member.param: The index position of the download

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.CancelAsyncAll
member.returns: TRUE, if all downloads were canceled. FALSE, if something goes wrong.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.CancelAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Cancels all running downloads containing the passed user argument.
member.param: The user argument that the download object contains.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.CancelAsyncAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Cancels a running download at specific index position.
member.param: The index position of the download process in queue.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Proves if the download processes contains the passed user argument.
member.param: Individual user argument that the download contains.
member.returns: The number of download processes containing the passed user argument.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.IDownload.AsyncDownloadsCount
member.summary: Gets the number of actually running asynchronous downloads.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for downloading data and controlling these download processes. This class must be inherited.
member.remarks: This class can not be instanced without inheritation

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.UserArgs
member.summary: Gets the user arguments of each download process.
member.remarks: If you just need a single object, you should use UserArgs(Int32) property, because of higher performance.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.UserArgs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the user argument of a download process at a specific index position.
member.param: The index position of the download

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.CancelAsyncAll
member.returns: TRUE, if all downloads were canceled. FALSE, if something goes wrong.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.CancelAsync(System.Object)
member.summary: Cancels all running downloads containing the passed user argument.
member.param: The user argument that the download object contains.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.CancelAsyncAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Cancels a running download at specific index position.
member.param: The index position of the download process in queue.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Proves if the download processes contains the passed user argument.
member.param: Individual user argument that the download contains.
member.returns: The number of download processes containing the passed user argument.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in miliseconds when the download will cancel if the time reached before it is completed.
member.value: Timeout in miliseconds. If value is '-1', the next download wont have a timeout.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.AsyncDownloadsCount
member.summary: Gets the number of actually running asynchronous downloads.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadClient`1.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the used proxy setting for download.
member.remarks: Default value are proxy settings from Internet Explorer/Windows Internet Settings.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionState
member.summary: Describes the end state of a connection.

member.name: F:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionState.Success
member.summary: Download process completed successfully without timeout, errors or cancelations

member.name: F:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionState.Canceled
member.summary: Download process was canceled by user interaction

member.name: F:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionState.Timeout
member.summary: Download process reached the setted timeout span

member.name: F:MaasOne.Base.ConnectionState.ErrorOccured
member.summary: An Error occured during download process

member.name: T:MaasOne.ITextEncodingSettings
member.summary: Provides properties for decoding text from streams.

member.name: T:MaasOne.IQuerySettings
member.summary: Provides properties for a webservice query.

member.name: T:MaasOne.IResultIndexSettings
member.summary: Provides properties to set the start index and count number for a query in results queue.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Finance.ISettableID.SetID(System.String)

member.summary: The ID of the historic quotes owning stock, index, etc.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.Open
member.summary: The first value in trading period.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.High
member.summary: The highest value in trading period.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.Low
member.summary: The lowest value in trading period.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.Close
member.summary: The last value in trading period.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.CloseAdjusted
member.summary: The last value in trading period in relation to share splits.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.HistQuotesData.PreviousClose
member.summary: The close value of the previous HistQuoteData in chain.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.IDSearchBaseData.ID
member.summary: The ID of the stock, index, etc.

member.summary: Calculates values of Standard Deviation for historic quote values.
member.returns: The sorted dictionaries. 1) StD values; 2) MA values; 3) Quote values.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Finance.Indicators.EMA
member.summary: Exponential Moving Average Indicator. Inherits from Moving Average(MA).

member.summary: Calculate values of Moving Average for historic quote values.
member.returns: The sorted dictionaries. 1) MA values; 2) Quote values.

member.summary: Calculates values of Exponential Moving Average for historic quote values.
member.returns: The sorted dictionaries. 1) EMA values; 2) MA values; 3) Quote values.

member.summary: Calculate values of Williams Percent Range for historic quote values.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN
member.summary: Class for managing an International Securities Identification Number.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: A valid ISIN with or without check digit
member.remarks: If check digit exists, it will be ignored, but in this case the string must be a digit to be a valid ISIN. The check digit will be calculated seperatly.

member.name: M:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN.IsValidFormatted(System.String)
member.summary: Checks a string for valid ISIN format
member.param: An ISIN with or without check digit
member.returns: True if ISIN is valid formatted
member.remarks: If check digit exists, it will be ignored, but in this case the string must be a digit to be a valid ISIN. The check digit will be calculated seperatly.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN.CountryCode
member.summary: The country specific part of the ISIN
member.returns: The first two letters if the ISIN is valid

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN.CoreCode
member.summary: The core part of the ISIN
member.returns: The ISIN without CountryCode and CheckDigit

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.ISIN.CheckDigit
member.summary: The calculated check digit of the ISIN

member.name: M:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.SetID(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a new ID value. Implementation from ISettableID.

member.summary: The price value of the QuoteBaseData

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.Change
member.summary: The change of the price in relation to close value of the previous day

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.Volume
member.summary: The trade volume of the day

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.PreviewClose
member.summary: The calculated close price of the last trading day

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.ChangeInPercent
member.summary: The calculated price change in percent

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.LastTradeDate
member.summary: The date value of the data

member.name: P:MaasOne.Finance.QuotesBaseData.LastTradeTime
member.summary: The time value of the data

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Category
member.summary: Specify one or more categories that the channel belongs to.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Cloud
member.summary: Allows processes to register with a cloud to be notified of updates to the channel, implementing a lightweight publish-subscribe protocol for RSS feeds.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Copyright
member.summary: Copyright notice for content in the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Description
member.summary: Phrase or sentence describing the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Documentation
member.summary: A URL that points to the documentation (http://www.rssboard.org/rss-specification) for the format used in the RSS file. It's probably a pointer to this page. It's for people who might stumble across an RSS file on a Web server 25 years from now and wonder what it is.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Generator
member.summary: A string indicating the program used to generate the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Image
member.summary: Specifies a GIF, JPEG or PNG image that can be displayed with the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Items
member.summary: A channel may contain any number of items. An item may represent a "story" -- much like a story in a newspaper or magazine; if so its description is a synopsis of the story, and the link points to the full story.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Language
member.summary: The language the channel is written in. This allows aggregators to group all Italian language sites, for example, on a single page.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.LastBuildDate
member.summary: The last time the content of the channel changed.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Link
member.summary: The URL to the HTML website corresponding to the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.ManagingEditor
member.summary: Email address for person responsible for editorial content.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.PublishDate
member.summary: The publication date for the content in the channel. For example, the New York Times publishes on a daily basis, the publication date flips once every 24 hours. That's when the pubDate of the channel changes.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Rating
member.summary: The PICS (http://www.w3.org/PICS/) rating for the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Skiphours
member.summary: A hint for aggregators telling them which hours they can skip. This element contains up to 24 hour sub-elements whose value is a number between 0 and 23, representing a time in GMT, when aggregators, if they support the feature, may not read the channel on hours listed in the SkipHours element. The hour beginning at midnight is hour zero.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Skipdays
member.summary: A hint for aggregators telling them which days they can skip. This element contains up to seven day sub-elements whose value is Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday or Sunday. Aggregators may not read the channel during days listed in the SkipDays element.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.TextInput
member.summary: Specifies a text input box that can be displayed with the channel. The purpose of the TextInput element is something of a mystery. You can use it to specify a search engine box. Or to allow a reader to provide feedback. Most aggregators ignore it.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Title
member.summary: The name of the channel. It's how people refer to your service. If you have an HTML website that contains the same information as your RSS file, the title of your channel should be the same as the title of your website.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Ttl
member.summary: ttl stands for time to live. It's a number of minutes that indicates how long a channel can be cached before refreshing from the source.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Feed.Webmaster
member.summary: Email address for person responsible for technical issues relating to channel.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem
member.summary: Stores data of a rss feed item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.Author
member.summary: Email address of the author of the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.Category
member.summary: Includes the item in one or more categories.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.Comments
member.summary: URL of a page for comments relating to the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.Enclosure
member.summary: Describes a media object that is attached to the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.GUID
member.summary: A string that uniquely identifies the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.PublishDate
member.summary: Indicates when the item was published.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.FeedItem.Source
member.summary: The RSS channel that the item came from.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.GUID
member.summary: Provides information about a globally unique identifier.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.GUID.ID
member.summary: It's a string that uniquely identifies the item. When present, an aggregator may choose to use this string to determine if an item is new.
member.remarks: There are no rules for the syntax of a guid. Aggregators must view them as a string. It's up to the source of the feed to establish the uniqueness of the string.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.GUID.IsPermaLink
member.summary: If the GUID element has an attribute named isPermaLink with a value of true, the reader may assume that it is a permalink to the item, that is, a url that can be opened in a Web browser, that points to the full item described by the FeedItem element.
member.value: If its value is FALSE, the guid may not be assumed to be a url, or a url to anything in particular.
member.remarks: IsPermaLink is optional, its default value is TRUE.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.Enclosure
member.summary: Enclosure describes a media object that is attached to the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Enclosure.Type
member.summary: The MIME type of the object.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Enclosure.Length
member.summary: The size in Bytes of the object.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.Source
member.summary: Provides information about the RSS channel where the item comes from.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Source.Title
member.summary: The title of the RSS channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Source.Url
member.summary: The url of the RSS channel.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.Category
member.summary: Provides information about catigorization of the item.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Image.URL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of a GIF, JPEG or PNG image that represents the channel.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Image.Link
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the site, when the channel is rendered, the image is a link to the site.
member.remarks: In practice the image TITLE and LINK should have the same value as the channel's TITLE and LINK.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Image.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is included in the TITLE attribute of the link formed around the image in the HTML rendering.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Image.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the image in pixels.
member.remarks: Maximum value is 144, default value is 88.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.Image.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the image in pixels.
member.remarks: Maximum value is 400, default value is 31.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.Cloud
member.summary: It's purpose is to allow processes to register with a cloud to be notified of updates to the channel, implementing a lightweight publish-subscribe protocol for RSS feeds.

member.name: T:MaasOne.RSS.TextInputBox
member.summary: Represents a text input box for doing something.
member.remarks: The purpose of the TextInputBox element is something of a mystery. You can use it to specify a search engine box. Or to allow a reader to provide feedback. Most aggregators ignore it.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.TextInputBox.Title
member.summary: The label of the Submit button in the text input area.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.TextInputBox.Name
member.summary: The name of the text object in the text input area.

member.name: P:MaasOne.RSS.TextInputBox.Link
member.summary: The URL of the CGI script that processes text input requests.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Search.SearchBaseData.Title
member.summary: Returns the Title string for this WebRequest.
member.remarks: The Title field contains the text specified in the HTML TITLE tag of the page.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Search.SearchBaseData.Description
member.summary: Returns the description text of the result.
member.remarks: This string contains a portion of the text from the body of the HTML page that contains the specified search terms.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Search.SearchBaseData.Url
member.summary: Returns the full URL for the result as a string.
member.remarks: The Url field contains the full URL to the page. This may contain extended information, such as instrumentation, and may be different than the DisplayUrl that you will want to display to the user. Typically, the Title is used to display the text of a hyperlink and the Url is used to specify the link target. This string contains the URL to the Web page.
